info.task: navigate backwards to link in dropdown
info.title: Navigate backwards to a link in a dropdown

setupScript.name: moveFocusToSecondLinkInDropdown
setupScript.description: sets the state of the first disclosure button to expanded, and sets focus on the second link of the associated dropdown

user: With focus on a link in the first dropdown, navigate to the previous link.
instructions.raw: With focus on a link in the first dropdown, navigate to the previous link.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
